thread.section_title: News Article Archive from M03 22, 2018 - Wsj.com
thread.title: Despite Stock Drop, U.S. Leading Economic Indicators Index Rose in February

author: Austen Hufford
title: Despite Stock Drop, U.S. Leading Economic Indicators Index Rose in February
text:
An economic index that measures U.S. business trends continued to increase in February.
The Conference Board Leading Economic Index rose 0.6% to 108.7. Economists polled by The Wall Street Journal were expecting the index to rise by 0.6%. The index rose 0.8% in January and 0.7% in December.
The index rose despite a downturn in the stock market...
